1.description: Each basic attack applies 1 Frost Stack on target.

2.description: Casts an icy breath causing knockback and applying Frost Stacks on enemies. Recharges ability by attacking.

3.description: Summons a crystal shard that applies Frost Stack at intervals to nearby enemies.

4.description: Blinks on a unit target. If the target is a Frozen enemy, then perform an Ice Break that deals magic damage to the target and consumes no charge.

1.description: Adds a star effect to Genuine's attacks, increasing attack range, projectile speed and dealing magical damage insted of physical damage.

2.description: Releases a dark wave that fears enemies and receive mana per enemy hit.

3.description: Banishes herself to a stellar shard dashing in the direction you move. This banishment can be canceled before reaching maximum distance. Upon returning from banishment at night, nearby enemies are put to sleep. The duration of the sleep is based on the distance traveled.

4.description: Calls upon the stars forcing night for a few seconds and increasing AGI. For each enemy in range, a Starfall is casted, dealing magical damage. The buff duration is longer at night. During night, your INT is increased and whenever you kill an enemy hero during night, you gain +1 INT permanently.

1.description: Spins cutting enemies and causing bleed to them.

2.description: Throws a kunai that Slows the enemy target. When the Slow ends, the target is Silenced, and any damage you or a copy of yourself deal to them will be converted to healing for you when the Silence ends. The first damage you or a copy deals breaks the Slow, starting the Silence.

3.description: Blinks to a location and throws shurikens that damage enemies in the selected direction.

4.description: You briefly vanishes from the battlefield, and reappear at a random position along with additional clones.

1.description: Sets AGI to 0 and increases Base Attack Time. Each attack deals critical damage, and for each physical damage dealt, stuns the target based on the damage dealt.

2.description: Jumps and hits the ground dealing physical damage to all enemies in the selected area.

3.description: Enter a semi-petrified form that grants you immunity to stun/freeze/root, blocks physical and magical damage, but limits your movespeed. Every second, release a wave that limits the movespeed of enemies equal to your current movespeed, and the first wave petrifies enemies. The greater the distance between the target and you, the longer the petrification lasts.

3b.description: Interrupts Tranquil Walk of Peace's buff.

4.description: Releases all energy to send forth a jagged crack in front of Ancient One. After 3 seconds, the crack implodes dealing holy damage to each enemy based on the energy released. The energy is increased by dealing or receiving damage, and it's drained overtime. The cast range increases by current energy.

1.description: Creates a magic barrier on himself that blocks physical attacks until a number of hits are blocked or until its durability wears off.

2.description: Links to an allied hero to take part of the damage taken in its place as Holy Damage.

3.description: Summons a Grand Cross around you, dealing Holy Damage over time to you based on your max health. All enemies within the Grand Cross are Silenced and take Holy Damage equal to the damage you dealt to yourself.

4.description: Deals additional Pure Damage on the attack, healing you for part of the damage dealt.

4b.description: Increases your max health and grants an aura that increases resistance to Holy-property Damage to allies.

1.description: Emits an Aura that increases Armor, and it's increased for everyone based on the number of allies within the aura. Aura range is global during daytime.

2.description:
Prevents an ally from taking any damage.
Can't self cast.

3.description: Fires your hammer, striking one target and bouncing to others, dealing Holy Damage and slowing them. The Holy Damage is based on your current Armor. The duration of the damage and slow decreases with each bounce.

4.description: Summons beams of light from the sky that randomly heal allied heroes at intervals. The more heroes alive, the shorter the interval between beams.

4b.description: Returns a single dead allied hero to life.

1.description: Increases STR whenever you attack an enemy.

2.description: Gives you a chance to block damage and stun enemies when they attacks you from side or behind.

3.description: Focuses for a few seconds and dashes forward, dealing damage and stun on enemies. The stun and damage is based on concentrated time.

4.description: Unleashes a flame in front of you that slow, burns enemies, and reduces their STR.

2.description: Creates an all damage barrier that absorbs a percentage of the damage. The barrier decreases over time. When the barrier is expired or is destroyed it will burst and deals damage and roots in an area around it.

4.description: Activates an debuff aura that reduces attack range (ranged units), and drains enemies health. Your life is also drained while the aura is active.

4b.description: Places a flag at your position to emit the Aura of the Undead in that location. Automatically the aura on you is deactivated. A new flag is replaced at the location of your death.

1.description: Launch into a maddened rage. Part of the damage taken is converted into Attack Damage.

2.description: Grants Lifesteal and Status Resistance based on his health deficit percentage. The lesser your health percentage, the greater the bonus.

3.description: Creates a bond with an enemy target, redirecting some of the damage taken by both of them to each other. If the distance between them exceeds the maximum range, the bond will be broken.

4.description: Summons a Blood Seal on the target area, inflicting Bleeding and Leash on enemies. Upon leaving the area, enemies will Bleed for a few seconds.

2.description: Calls souls from the underworld to curse the target, causing them to take damage per second and Slow.

3.description: Summons a group of spirits that circle around you. Enemies within the area receive Break and have healing and health regeneration disabled. Spirits deal damage when passing through them.

1b.description: Absorbs a spirit, receiving the accumulated healing.

1.description: Launches a grenade at the target area that explodes after a delay, dealing damage to enemies and reducing their Armor.

2.description: Summons a thousands of bullets to rain down onto an area, causing damage overtime and slow to all enemies within.

3.description: Blinks in one direction at a fixed distance.

4.description: Performs a burst of shots in front of you. Bullets recharge over time and will reload faster by standing still.

1.description: Slashes an enemy multiple times. Each slash has a chance to not consume a charge.

3.description: Swallows an ally, banishing them until you spit them out. The ally gains Health Regen while you are slowed and have your CON increased. You begin to lose health if you take too long to spit them out.

4.description: Whenever you attack or slash, you have a chance to mark the target with a sauce that causes Bleeding (stackable).

5.description: Bocuse enters rage mode, slashing all enemies in front of him. Grants Lifesteal and increases Status Resistance.

1.description: Generates a path of bushes that roots enemies.

2.description: Infuses the allied target with a protective coating which increases target's Armor, Magical Resistance and Health Regen. When taking damage, spawns seeds to heal allies.

3.description: Summons a flower that heals nearby allies and damages nearby enemies at intervals.

4.description: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around a tree that roots enemies. For each ally in range, damages affected enemies at intervals and spawns a seed for each with healing based on the number of enemies affected. The Root duration is longer the closer the enemy is to the tree.

4b.description: Regrows trees that have been cut down at the selected location and pushes all units out of that location.

1.description: Fires a devastating shot that deals damage at global range, having a chance to kill the target and increase cooldown. The lower the target's health the greater the chance to kill him.

2.description: Chop down a tree to get poison ammo.

3.description: Scans a location, revealing the entire area for a few seconds.

4.description: Becomes camouflaged by standing near a tree. Camouflage grants Tree Walking and bonus attack range but limits your movespeed.

1.description: Creates a healing field with the nature's force that heal allies over time.

2.skillname: Lash of the Lizard King of the Crimson Witness

3.description: Hexes a target ally, increasing their movespeed.

4.description: Summons a ward that deals poison damage.

3b.description: Adds fire property to your attacks.
